Incident.Summary: Sexual solicitation of a minor. Cybertips #167373763, 167376182

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Attachments -NCMEC Cybertips #167373763, 167376182 -Comcast subpoena return Narrative On September 12, 2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section /Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTips #167373763, 167376182. The CyberTips, generated by Roblox, indicated that a subject was enticing children for sexual acts. The CyberTip was assigned to TFC Burnett for investigation. CyberTip #167373763 provided the following information pertaining to the suspect: Address: Waldorf, MD US Screen/User Name: uejdjdhdhejwnn Display Name: nuggets IP Address: 73.86.149.204 07-26-2023 20:30:03 UTC Estimated Location: Waldorf, Maryland, US at 07-26-2023 05:41:45 UTC (Not Verified) TFC Burnett reviewed this Cybertip and observed the below concerning chat log. Game Name: Roblox Game Chat Logs: Group ID: 184799; Group Wall Post: I wanna rub my sussage against an 11 y/o while the priod blood is smeared around her aaa so that my sussage gets that good nectar jui CyberTip #167376182 provided the following information pertaining to the suspect: Address: Waldorf, MD US Screen/User Name: Bitofconcernsalt9 Display Name: Bitofconcernsalt9 IP Address: 73.86.149.204 07-26-2023 20:43:21 UTC Estimated Location: Waldorf, Maryland, US at 07-26-2023 05:45:00 UTC (Not Verified) TFC Burnett reviewed this Cybertip and observed the below concerning chat log. Game Name: Roblox Game Chat Logs: Group ID: 184799; Group Wall Post: I wanna put my finger up a 4 year olds little kitten and i wanna measure how small hers is and after that i wanna put my cross into it TFC Burnett observed the IP address (73.86.149.204) in both Cybertips, it is registered to Comcast and geo-locates to Waldorf, MD. Attached to the Cybertips was a Comcast subpoena return from Deputy Horrocks with the Charles County Sheriffs Office. On 9/7/2023, he received the subpoena with the below information: Subscriber name: Christop Wolford SSN: 235-29-9000 Service/Billing Address: 29994 Douglas Circle, Mechanicsville, Md Telephone: 301-440-9197 Account Status: Active I conducted a police search and observed the name Christopher Daniel Woolford (W/M, DOB: 3/11/1977), located at 29994 Doulas Circle, Mechanicsville, MD. A further search of the address revealed his wife, Allissa Janelle Woolford (W/F, DOB: 2/10/1981). Based on the information in the Cybertips, a knock and talk will be conducted. Case Status OPEN / PENDING ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATION

NARRATIVE: On 9/18/2023, at approximately 0645 hours, Sgt. Pitcher and I responded to 29994 Douglas Circle, Mechanicsville, MD to conduct a knock and talk. Upon numerous knocks at the door, no answer was made. I contacted Christopher Wolford on his cellphone (301-440-9197) who advised he just left for work but was able to turn around to return to the house. At approximately 0659 hours, Christopher returned to the residence, and we explained why we were there. Christopher explained that he has a 17-year-old daughter, 15-year-old son, and a 13-year-old son who play on Roblox. Christopher provided the kids usernames of what he could remember that his kids and wife had, but they did not match up to what the Cybertips reported. We provided the usernames to Christopher, which did not seem familiar. Christopher advised he would talk with his kids and see what they might know. We provided Christopher with some internet safety, advising to change his WiFi password, along with talking with his children. This knock and talk was conducted for educational purposes. Case closed.

Narrative: On 9/19/2023, I was contacted by Christopher Wolford by phone advising he talked with his children and it was made aware that his 14 year old son was the account holder of the two suspect accounts. Wolford advised he would like for us to speak with his son about the safety of the internet, which was scheduled for 9/22/2023 at 1400 hours. On 9/22/2023, at approximately 1340 hours, I made contact with Wolford and his son at the Maryland State Police Leonardtown Barrack to talk about the social media issue. It was advised by Wolfords son that he made approximately 15 accounts on Roblox that were used for gaming, trolling and alternate accounts. He explained that he started the conversation with an unknown person, and did not give a good reason why he was stating those things. They were advised of internet safety and this contact was conducted for educational purposes. Case closed.
